scripts.dev: concurrently -n SERVER,CLIENT,HISTORY -c blue,green,red "cd packages/server && npm run dev" "cd packages/client && npm run dev" "cd packages/history && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd packages/server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently -n SERVER,CLIENT -c blue,green "cd packages/server && npm run start" "cd packages/client && npm run start"
